New Records: Shohei Ohtani stole his 56th base of the season, tying him with Ichiro Suzuki for the most in a season by a Japanese-born player
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani singled in the go-ahead run before stealing his 56th base of the season
Fernando Tatis Jr.'s 448-foot home run tied the game at 3-3
Michael Kopech earned his 15th save with a strikeout to end the game
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts expressed optimism about clinching the NL West
Fernando Tatis Jr. stated they would keep coming and bringing the same energy in the next game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was part of a series finale on September 25, 2024
Will Smith drew a leadoff walk that led to the go-ahead run
